segments.text: Welcome to Bill ’ s Fabric World . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was wondering if you guys also tailor clothes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure we do ! We have the best tailors in the country ! What is it that you need exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ m looking to get a custom-made suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent ! We have the finest cashmeres at affordable prices.How about we get you measured ? Let ’ s start off by measuring the width of your shoulders . Now , let ’ s measure the length of your arms and this bit around your neck here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you make sure you leave a little extra space in the collar ? My neck gets easily irritated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem ! Now for your pants , let me just measure your waist and the inseam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might also want to leave a little extra room in the waist area . I tend to gain a few pounds over the holidays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Now you can pick your fabric and pattern design . Please follow me .
segments.speaker: S1
